rows.label: qev031201_MSG0001
rows.name: Wazdo Tygant! Gather all idle clansmen![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG0002
rows.name:
Find fool who stole my daughter!
Water fields with their blood![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG0003
rows.name: I would even war with Earth aliens for Lavina![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG0004
rows.name: Spoken like true Prone warrior![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG0005
rows.name:
...Hmm? Earth alien! Why have you come?
Are you spy for Leroy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_JNK0010
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev031201_SEL0011
rows.name: Say you have no idea what he's rambling on about.

rows.label: qev031201_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev031201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask who Leroy is.

rows.label: qev031201_MSG0006
rows.name: ...No. You have braver face than that scum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG0007
rows.name:
Earth alien named Leroy stole my daughter.
Anger clouds my mind. Forgive me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG0008
rows.name:
Leroy is Earth alien who stole my daughter! Rrrgh!
I did not think that weakling capable of such bold
scheme.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG0009
rows.name:
Will you help me, Earth alien?
Help me retrieve my daughter?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG0010
rows.name:
Leroy fled to commercial district. It would be better
for Earth alien like you to look for him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG0011
rows.name:
I am glad there are good [ST:gender p1=men p2=women ] like you among
Earth aliens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG0012
rows.name:
My daughter was to wed Wazdo Tygant.
Go bring her home to that happy future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG0013
rows.name:
Leroy is coward. He will hide in deserted corner
far away from others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG1001
rows.name:
I met Leroy once in past. He was weak and cowardly.
Even for Earth alien.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG1002
rows.name:
Such weakling will choose place hidden from others.
He will hide in dark corner of commercial district.
Go. Track him down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG2001
rows.name: You played me for fool. Yet my daughter has returned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG2002
rows.name: Hmph. Take promised reward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG2004
rows.name:
When we traded blows, I saw boundless potential
of your kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG2005
rows.name:
I thought only Prone could be so strong.
Now I will demand that strength of Leroy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG2006
rows.name: He has sworn to protect Lavina. I will not suffer liars.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG2007
rows.name: I will beat him into shape. That is Prone way![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG3001
rows.name: I watched fight with weakling Leroy from start to end.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG3002
rows.name: You are warrior. But weakling held his own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev031201_SEL0031
rows.name: Acknowledge Leroy's skill.

rows.label: qev031201_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev031201_SEL0041
rows.name: Laugh Leroy off as child's play.

rows.label: qev031201_MSG3003
rows.name: You would know better than any.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG3004
rows.name:
Most are when compared to you. Even among Prone,
few warriors are your equal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG3005
rows.name:
You Earth aliens are interesting lot.
Small bodies are host to much possibility.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG3006
rows.name: I hope Leroy is stronger man some day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031201_MSG3007
rows.name:
You have aided me, Earth alien.
Take this with thanks.[ST:wait ]
